briefdescription.para: Soft Constraints suitable for local structure prediction using window approach.

briefdescription.para: The type of a soft constraint.
Typename for the soft constraints data structure vrna_sc_s.

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* vrna_sc_f) (int i, int j, int k, int l, unsigned char d, void *data)
memberdef.argsstring: )(int i, int j, int k, int l, unsigned char d, void *data)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_f

briefdescription.para: Callback to retrieve pseudo energy contribution for soft constraint feature.

detaileddescription.para: This is the prototype for callback functions used by the folding recursions to evaluate generic soft constraints. The first four parameters passed indicate the delimiting nucleotide positions of the decomposition, and the parameter denotes the decomposition step. The last parameter data is the auxiliary data structure associated to the hard constraints via vrna_sc_add_data(), or NULL if no auxiliary data was added.

parblock.para: This callback enables one to add (pseudo-)energy contributions to individual decompositions of the secondary structure.

simplesect.para: VRNA_DECOMP_PAIR_HP, VRNA_DECOMP_PAIR_IL, VRNA_DECOMP_PAIR_ML, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_ML_ML, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_STEM, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_ML, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_UP, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_ML_STEM, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_COAXIAL, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_EXT, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_UP, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_STEM, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_EXT_EXT, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_STEM_EXT, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_EXT_STEM, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_EXT_STEM1, vrna_sc_add_f(), vrna_sc_add_exp_f(), vrna_sc_add_bt(), vrna_sc_add_data()

parameterdescription.para: Left (5') delimiter position of substructure
Right (3') delimiter position of substructure
Left delimiter of decomposition
Right delimiter of decomposition
Decomposition step indicator
Auxiliary data

simplesect.para: Pseudo energy contribution in deka-kalories per mol

memberdef.name: vrna_sc_exp_f

briefdescription.para: Callback to retrieve pseudo energy contribution as Boltzmann Factors for soft constraint feature.

detaileddescription.para: This is the prototype for callback functions used by the partition function recursions to evaluate generic soft constraints. The first four parameters passed indicate the delimiting nucleotide positions of the decomposition, and the parameter denotes the decomposition step. The last parameter data is the auxiliary data structure associated to the hard constraints via vrna_sc_add_data(), or NULL if no auxiliary data was added.

parblock.para: This callback enables one to add (pseudo-)energy contributions to individual decompositions of the secondary structure (Partition function variant, i.e. contributions must be returned as Boltzmann factors).

simplesect.para: VRNA_DECOMP_PAIR_HP, VRNA_DECOMP_PAIR_IL, VRNA_DECOMP_PAIR_ML, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_ML_ML, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_STEM, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_ML, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_UP, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_ML_STEM, VRNA_DECOMP_ML_COAXIAL, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_EXT, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_UP, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_STEM, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_EXT_EXT, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_STEM_EXT, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_EXT_STEM, VRNA_DECOMP_EXT_EXT_STEM1, vrna_sc_add_exp_f(), vrna_sc_add_f(), vrna_sc_add_bt(), vrna_sc_add_data()

parameterdescription.para: Left (5') delimiter position of substructure
Right (3') delimiter position of substructure
Left delimiter of decomposition
Right delimiter of decomposition
Decomposition step indicator
Auxiliary data

simplesect.para: Pseudo energy contribution in deka-kalories per mol

briefdescription.para: Callback to retrieve auxiliary base pairs for soft constraint feature.

parblock.para: This callback enables one to add auxiliary base pairs in the backtracking steps of hairpin- and interior loops.

briefdescription.para: Initialize an empty soft constraints data structure within a vrna_fold_compound_t.

detaileddescription.para: This function adds a proper soft constraints data structure to the vrna_fold_compound_t data structure. If soft constraints already exist within the fold compound, they are removed.

simplesect.para: Accepts vrna_fold_compound_t of type VRNA_FC_TYPE_SINGLE and VRNA_FC_TYPE_COMPARATIVE
vrna_sc_set_bp(), vrna_sc_set_up(), vrna_sc_add_SHAPE_deigan(), vrna_sc_add_SHAPE_zarringhalam(), vrna_sc_remove(), vrna_sc_add_f(), vrna_sc_add_exp_f(), vrna_sc_add_pre(), vrna_sc_add_post()

parameterdescription.para: The vrna_fold_compound_t where an empty soft constraint feature is to be added to

parblock.para: This function is attached as method sc_init() to objects of type fold_compound. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_init()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, unsigned int i, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_update

briefdescription.para: Set soft constraints for paired nucleotides.

simplesect.para: This function replaces any pre-exisitng soft constraints with the ones supplied in constraints.
vrna_sc_add_bp(), vrna_sc_set_up(), vrna_sc_add_up()

parameterdescription.para: The vrna_fold_compound_t the soft constraints are associated with
A two-dimensional array of pseudo free energies in $ kcal / mol $
The options flag indicating how/where to store the soft constraints

simplesect.para: Non-zero on successful application of the constraint, 0 otherwise.

parblock.para: This function is attached as method sc_set_bp() to objects of type fold_compound. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_set_bp()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, int i, int j, FLT_OR_DBL energy, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_add_bp

briefdescription.para: Add soft constraints for paired nucleotides.

detaileddescription.para:
vrna_sc_set_bp(), vrna_sc_set_up(), vrna_sc_add_up()
fc
The vrna_fold_compound_t the soft constraints are associated with
i
The 5' position of the base pair the soft constraint is added for
j
The 3' position of the base pair the soft constraint is added for
energy
The free energy (soft-constraint) in $ kcal / mol $
options
The options flag indicating how/where to store the soft constraints
Non-zero on successful application of the constraint, 0 otherwise.
SWIG Wrapper Notes
This function is attached as an overloaded method sc_add_bp() to objects of type fold_compound. The method either takes arguments for a single base pair (i,j) with the corresponding energy value:
fold_compound.sc_add_bp(i,j,energy,options) or an entire 2-dimensional matrix with dimensions n x n that stores free energy contributions for any base pair (i,j) with $ 1 \leq i < j \leq n $: fold_compound.sc_add_bp(matrix,options) In both variants, the optional argument options defaults to VRNA_OPTION_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_add_bp()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

briefdescription.para: Set soft constraints for unpaired nucleotides.

simplesect.para: This function replaces any pre-exisitng soft constraints with the ones supplied in constraints.
vrna_sc_add_up(), vrna_sc_set_bp(), vrna_sc_add_bp()

parameterdescription.para: The vrna_fold_compound_t the soft constraints are associated with
A vector of pseudo free energies in $ kcal / mol $
The options flag indicating how/where to store the soft constraints

simplesect.para: Non-zero on successful application of the constraint, 0 otherwise.

parblock.para: This function is attached as method sc_set_up() to objects of type fold_compound. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_set_up()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, int i, FLT_OR_DBL energy, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_add_up

briefdescription.para: Add soft constraints for unpaired nucleotides.

detaileddescription.para:
vrna_sc_set_up(), vrna_sc_add_bp(), vrna_sc_set_bp()
fc
The vrna_fold_compound_t the soft constraints are associated with
i
The nucleotide position the soft constraint is added for
energy
The free energy (soft-constraint) in $ kcal / mol $
options
The options flag indicating how/where to store the soft constraints
Non-zero on successful application of the constraint, 0 otherwise.
SWIG Wrapper Notes
This function is attached as an overloaded method sc_add_up() to objects of type fold_compound. The method either takes arguments for a single nucleotide $i $ with the corresponding energy value:
fold_compound.sc_add_up(i,energy,options) or an entire vector that stores free energy contributions for each nucleotide $i $ with $ 1 \leq i \leq n $: fold_compound.sc_add_bp(vector,options) In both variants, the optional argument options defaults to VRNA_OPTION_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_add_up()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

briefdescription.para: Free memory occupied by a vrna_sc_t data structure.

parameterdescription.para: The data structure to free from memory

briefdescription.para: Add an auxiliary data structure for the generic soft constraints callback function.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_add_f(), vrna_sc_add_exp_f(), vrna_sc_add_bt()

parameterdescription.para: The fold compound the generic soft constraint function should be bound to
A pointer to the data structure that holds required data for function 'f'
A pointer to a function that free's the memory occupied by data (Maybe NULL)

simplesect.para: Non-zero on successful binding the data (and free-function), 0 otherwise

parblock.para: This function is attached as method sc_add_data() to objects of type fold_compound. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_add_data()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

briefdescription.para: Bind a function pointer for generic soft constraint feature (MFE version)

detaileddescription.para: This function allows one to easily bind a function pointer and corresponding data structure to the soft constraint part vrna_sc_t of the vrna_fold_compound_t. The function for evaluating the generic soft constraint feature has to return a pseudo free energy $ \hat{E} $ in $ dacal/mol $, where $ 1 dacal/mol = 10 cal/mol $.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_add_data(), vrna_sc_add_bt(), vrna_sc_add_exp_f()

parameterdescription.para: The fold compound the generic soft constraint function should be bound to
A pointer to the function that evaluates the generic soft constraint feature

simplesect.para: Non-zero on successful binding the callback function, 0 otherwise

parblock.para: This function is attached as method sc_add_f() to objects of type fold_compound. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_add_f()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, vrna_sc_direct_f cb, vrna_sc_exp_direct_f cb_exp, void *data, vrna_auxdata_prepare_f prepare_cb, vrna_auxdata_free_f free_cb, unsigned int decomp_type)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_multi_cb_add

briefdescription.para: Bind a backtracking function pointer for generic soft constraint feature.

detaileddescription.para: This function allows one to easily bind a function pointer to the soft constraint part vrna_sc_t of the vrna_fold_compound_t. The provided function should be used for backtracking purposes in loop regions that were altered via the generic soft constraint feature. It has to return an array of vrna_basepair_t data structures, were the last element in the list is indicated by a value of -1 in it's i position.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_add_data(), vrna_sc_add_f(), vrna_sc_add_exp_f()

parameterdescription.para: The fold compound the generic soft constraint function should be bound to
A pointer to the function that returns additional base pairs

simplesect.para: Non-zero on successful binding the callback function, 0 otherwise

parblock.para: This function is attached as method sc_add_bt() to objects of type fold_compound. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_add_bt()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

briefdescription.para: Bind a function pointer for generic soft constraint feature (PF version)

detaileddescription.para: This function allows one to easily bind a function pointer and corresponding data structure to the soft constraint part vrna_sc_t of the vrna_fold_compound_t. The function for evaluating the generic soft constraint feature has to return a pseudo free energy $ \hat{E} $ as Boltzmann factor, i.e. $ exp(- \hat{E} / kT) $. The required unit for $ E $ is $ cal/mol $.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_add_bt(), vrna_sc_add_f(), vrna_sc_add_data()

parameterdescription.para: The fold compound the generic soft constraint function should be bound to
A pointer to the function that evaluates the generic soft constraint feature

simplesect.para: Non-zero on successful binding the callback function, 0 otherwise

parblock.para: This function is attached as method sc_add_exp_f() to objects of type fold_compound. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_add_exp_f()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

briefdescription.para: Functions and data structures for secondary structure soft constraints.
